text: Picture of Harav Yisroel Dovid Harfenes at his grandsons wedding Rabbi Yisroel Dovid ben Menachem Nachum Harfenes is a Haredi posek ("decisor of Jewish law") and scholar, residing in Williamsburg, Brooklyn, New York. He is the Rabbi of the Yisroel Vehazmanim Synagogue in Williamsburg, and is the author of multiple books on Halakha. Many of the books he has authored are responsa His mother was Sara Harfenes and his father was Menachem Nuchem Harfenes His siblings are, Moshe Shaul Harfenes, Chanie Singer, Yoily (Yoel) Harfenes and Chaya Miriam Scharter Among the books he has authored are: *Yisroel Vehazmanim on zmanim *Yisroel VeOraisa *Chinuch Yisroel *Mekadesh Hashabos *Mekadesh Yisroel (responsa) *Nishmas Yisroel *Nishmas Shabos (responsa) *Vayevarech Dovid *Dudaei Yisroel *Yisroel Araivim *Shirai Dovid *Pri Eitz Hadar Many of these books are available online (for free) at hebrewbooks.org. He is a dayan on the Hisachdus Harabonim Beth din in Williamsburg.
